post.text: For 30 years -- 30 YEARS -- Hillary Clinton hasn't fixed anything. In fact, her only experience has been at failing. As President, believe me, there will be dramatic change. We are going to get things DONE! #AmericaFirst

replies.author: Jarrett
replies.text: Bro he said he would bring back jobs correct?? Well I'm saying that I can walk on water... Now I bet you would like me to tell you how I'm gonna do that right?? Same with me talk is cheap. And on the flip side I don't like Hillary either but she was prepared for the debate and slaughtered Donald Trump... She doesn't need to be up 50 points as long as your up . Not paying taxes is a slap in anyone's face that's in the middle class sector!!
